update hkt_attribute
cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
attr_name = #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attr_input_type = #{attrInputType,jdbcType=BIT},
attr_type = #{attrType,jdbcType=BIT},
attr_index = #{attrIndex,jdbcType=BIT},
sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT},

attr_values = #{attrValues,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}

update hkt_attribute set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, attr_name = #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_input_type = #{attrInputType,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_type = #{attrType,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_index = #{attrIndex,jdbcType=BIT}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_linked = #{isLinked,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_group = #{attrGroup,jdbcType=BIT}, is_show_img = #{isShowImg,jdbcType=TINYINT} where attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select a.attr_name as attrName ,b.attr_value as attrValue, b.goods_id as goodsId from hkt_goods_attr as b left join hkt_attribute as a on a.attr_id=b.attr_id where goods_id = #{gid}
